name: heroku-mcp-host
description: MCP Host that bridges Salesforce (Apex/Flow) with remote MCP servers via REST API

API_KEY.description: API key for authenticating requests from Salesforce

MCP_SERVERS.description: JSON configuration for MCP servers. Format: {"name": {"url": "https://server/sse", "transport": "sse"}}

MCP_TIMEOUT.description: Default timeout for MCP operations in milliseconds

CORS_ORIGINS.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins, or * for all
